data.title: The Tribune Democrat
data.meta_description: Mary Hotham passed away. This is the full obituary where you can share condolences and memories. Published in the The Tribune Democrat on 2016-11-10.
data.text:
,89 of Delaware, Ohio, formerly of Johnstown, passed away November 8, 2016 at Riverside Methodist Hospital, Ohio. Born September 23, 1927 in Johnstown, daughter of Metro and Mary (Roman) Leiptch. Preceded in death by parents; husband, Richard Hotham; sisters, Anna Kendera, Katherine Roman, Betty Brandes, Rose Krawick, Helen Harr; brother, Ronald Winarchick. Survived by loving children, Susan Hotham, Delaware, Ohio; and Thomas, married to the former Robin Walker, Marysville, Ohio. Grandchildren, Sarah, married to Gary Norris, Marysville, Ohio; and Ian Hotham, Indianapolis, Indiana; great-grandchild, Addelyn Norris. Mary was a 1945 graduate of Johnstown High. She was active at the Community Arts Center where she received the Volunteer of the Year Award, member of Johnstown Chapter of the Flower Club, and also an American Red Cross volunteer. Also a member of Trinity Lutheran Church. At Mary's request visitation and services will be private. Rev. Robert Kaltenbaugh officiating. Interment Grandview Cemetery. In lieu of flowers please make donation to Sarah Moore House, 26 Norton Union Street, Delaware, OH 43015 and /or Johnstown Community Art's Center, 1217 Menoher Blvd Johnstown, PA 15905. Please visit www.geiselfh.com

Published on November 10, 2016

Note: These are general guidelines; some florists may not be able to operate within these timelines. During peak periods such as Valentineâ€™s Day, Memorial Day and most holidays, florists are not always able to keep up to demand. Tribute will contact you if there are any issues.

Plant a tree: How does it work

When your purchase is complete, a post will be made on the tribute wall of the deceased signifying the planting of a memorial tree.

An official certificate recognizing your purchase will be included with your email receipt. You can then forward the email to the family or print it and give it to them personally.

After an order is placed, our forestry partners will plant the tree in the area of greatest need (nearest the funeral home), according to the planting schedule for the year.

Due to seasonal conditions, the tree planting takes place during the spring and summer.

Tree Planting Timeline

Orders placed in:

January - May

Planting will take place in Spring or Summer of the same year.

June - December

Planting will take place in Spring of the following year.
